statements: UPDATE changes_tracking SET timestamp = '2022-02-15 10:30:00' WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE changes_tracking SET geospatial_data = ST_GeomFromText('POINT(10 20)') WHERE id = '87654321-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE changes_tracking SET timestamp='2022-10-15 08:30:00', geospatial_data=ST_GeomFromText('POINT(40.7128 -74.0060)') WHERE id='1ba832bc-f208-4d09-8e59-83119d83e714';
UPDATE changes_tracking SET geospatial_data=ST_GeomFromText('POLYGON((30 10, 40 40, 20 40, 10 20, 30 10))'), timestamp='2022-10-20 14:45:00' WHERE id='3d66d930-d5b3-4827-967b-9d77d877a93f';
UPDATE geospatial_changes SET change_description = 'Updated coordinates' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE user_tracking SET location = ST_SetSRID(ST_MakePoint(10, 20), 4326), last_updated = '2022-01-20 08:30:00' WHERE user_id = 5;
UPDATE geospatial_changes SET change_description = 'Updated coordinates' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE user_tracking SET location = ST_SetSRID(ST_MakePoint(37.7749, -122.4194), 4326), last_updated = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE user_id = 10;
UPDATE geospatial_data_changes SET timestamp = '2022-01-01 12:00:00', location = ST_GeomFromText('POINT(10 20)') WHERE change_id = 1;
UPDATE geospatial_data_updates SET previous_location = ST_GeomFromText('POINT(50 50)'), updated_location = ST_GeomFromText('POINT(60 60)'), timestamp = '2022-01-02 08:30:00' WHERE update_id = 2;
UPDATE geospatial_data_changes SET location = ST_GeomFromText('POINT(1 1)') WHERE change_id = 1;
UPDATE geospatial_data_updates SET previous_location = ST_GeomFromText('POINT(2 2)'), updated_location = ST_GeomFromText('POINT(3 3') WHERE update_id = 2;
UPDATE changes_over_time SET timestamp = '2021-10-15 12:30:00' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE users SET location = ST_GeomFromText('POINT(50.1234 7.4321)') WHERE user_id = 5;
UPDATE changes_over_time SET timestamp = '2022-10-15 08:30:00', geospatial_data = ST_GeomFromText('POINT(10 20)') WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE users SET location = ST_GeomFromText('POLYGON((0 0, 0 10, 10 10, 10 0, 0 0))'), username = 'John Doe' WHERE user_id = 100;
UPDATE changes SET change_type = 'Modified', change_timestamp = '2022-09-15' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE objects SET description = 'Updated description' WHERE object_id = 2;
UPDATE changes SET change_timestamp = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE objects SET description = 'New Description' WHERE object_id = 2;
